extendedInfo.description: Spend less time studying and more time flying! This is the FAA Private and Recreational Pilot version of GroundSchool, our FAA knowledge (written) test preparation featuring up-to-date questions, free updates, and illustrated explanations written by a professional team of pilot examiners and instructors.*** This app has now been updated with many new features, including support for favorite questions, a more robust and faster update feature, support for a wider range of devices, integration with the (optional) StudyStatus.com test monitoring / results sharing service, question search, and much more!  ***Don't be fooled by imitators! Competing apps use only the limited set of questions that the FAA publicly releases via its website - that is not enough to adequately prepare you for your test! Study actual, up-to-date FAA questions and then ACE your FAA Private Pilot and/or Recreational Pilot knowledge (written) test the easy way with GroundSchool FAA Knowledge Test Preparation software by Dauntless Aviation, the trusted leader in FAA written test preparation.Features:* Actual FAA Questions Current and Valid for Right Now. As soon as you install the software, use the 'update' feature and the software will connect to our servers, grab the latest questions, images, figures, and explanation content, and you'll be good to go.* Detailed Explanations written by an experienced editorial team of examiner and instructor pilots.* All Charts and Figures Included* Several flexible study modes - fits the way you want to study!* Compatible with all FAA "ground school" classroom-based coursesThis Private and Recreational Pilot version of GroundSchool will prepare you for any or all of the following tests:* Private Pilot Airplane (PAR)* Private Pilot Rotorcraft Helicopter (PRH)* Private Pilot Glider (PGL)* Private Pilot Balloon - Gas (PBG)* Private Pilot Balloon - Hot Air (PBH)* Private Pilot Rotorcraft Gyroplane (PRG)* Private Pilot Powered Parachute (PPP)* Private Pilot Weight Shift Control (PWS)* Private Pilot Lighter-than-Air (Airship) (PLA)* Recreational Pilot Airplane (RPA)* Recreational Pilot Helicopter (RPH)* Recreational Pilot Gyroplane (RPG)* Private Pilot Airplane / Recreational Pilot - Transition (PAT)* Private Pilot Helicopter / Recreational Pilot Transition (PHT)* Private Pilot Gyroplane / Recreational Pilot Transition (PGT)* Canadian Private Pilot to USA FAA Conversion (PCP)With Dauntless Aviation's GroundSchool, you don't need to worry:* Our material is UP TO DATE. No matter what date is listed here in regarding the 'Release date', this date refers to the program itself only. Once you get the program on your device, use the built-in update feature and it will connect to our servers and download the latest and greatest version of the test prep content and our explanations that we have available. To learn more about this, please visit our website.* Furthermore, you are welcome to update the material as often as you like. This means that even if you don't take your test soon, when do you, GroundSchool will be ready for you. Compare this to books or DVDs (which are going out of date from the moment they are printed).* We pride ourselves on the quality of our explanations. This is not some idle boast - our explanations are more detailed and more illustrated than that of ANY other FAA knowledge test provider, period.* Tens of thousands of people have used our products to prepare for their FAA knowledge tests. Ours is a system that works.Good luck on your test!

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This is great software and the test material comes with very thorough explanations. It is great for studying and the app lets me study just about anywhere when I have a free minute. I used other study guides before but this company really polishes their product! I will definitely purchase the instrument/commercial study guides when it comes time to work on those ratings!
reviews.author: Cade Peterson

reviews.title: BEST PPL TEST PREP APP!
reviews.comment: Easy to use and always in my hand!!! I study every-time I use my phone.  I really like how they provide an explanation for every answer.  This was suggested to me by a friend who scored a 93% using this app.  I can pick a topic, study for however long I like and save my progress.   It also saves your progress if you are interrupted in the middle of a question. I have the S4 and it runs perfect.  Thanks Dauntless!
reviews.author: Corey LeBlanc

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Would be a lot easier if you added a virtual ruler or something like it to use on the charts and such. Also maybe a built in calculator / e6b to help with the calculations. Also maybe the ability to scribble on the charts. This would help in the study process.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best one out there for the Androids (SIII) +Nexus7
reviews.comment: Great app. Let\342\200\231s get to the point. Worth every dime -period.  I have bought 3 different apps plus the 2013 ASA Test Prep book. I have used all four \342\200\246. front to back a couple of times. Sporty\'s study buddy just states \"correct or incorrect\

reviews.title: Excellent learning tool
reviews.comment: I am preparing for my written test and decided to take the risk on this app. It was a good decision.  I have been able to retain an incredible amount of information as compared to just reading the private pilot manual. One of my favorite features is the question stacks. I feel very confident passing the test will be no problem now. Worth every penny...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Great app! Just passed my FAA Written today with the help of using this app as a prime source of study aid.
reviews.author: Ryan Rathbun

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: Paid for this piece of trash and after four attempts to download I get an error message that says \"package file invalid \". MAJOR scam stay away!!!

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Just do the test in this app, when you score 80% or above in a row, do your actual test. U\'ll be fine. I score 92% on mine. 50bucks is cheaper than 100 bucks you have to spend to retake your test if u failed
reviews.author: Evan julian

reviews.title: PPL Written Test Prep
reviews.comment: Studied two to three hours per day in conjunction with other books.  Scored 100% on first attempt taking actual FAA Airman Knowledge Exam for Rotorcraft Helicopter.  Check ride here I come!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Costomer Service
reviews.comment: I had a few problems at first downloading the app. .. I contacted costumer service and they got back to me in several hours with the solution. It was then resolved and I could proceed to studying.    Student pilot Helicopter
reviews.author: Kyle Wool

reviews.comment: Studied and the test questions were exactly like the faa....got 90% passing...finished my test in 20 minutes...great product...will buy again for my other ratings
reviews.author: Neeraj Diwan

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I really like this app. It has a large question bank and is easy to use. It is very helpful in studying for my private pilot exam. I like b/c I can use it anywhere at anytime. I don\'t have to sit down for an hour to learn a subject then do a couple of questions. I can learn at my own pace and on my own time. I would recommend this app for anyone studying to take the test.
reviews.author: Stuart Wall

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I used this App in conjunction with other study books. This App was by far the best tool during my studies. I could pick it up for 5min and then save my progress. It was completely flexible. I scored an 88% on my 1st try on the FAA knowledge test. By far VERY well worth the cost. Thanks Dauntless!!!
reviews.author: Warren Brantley

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I don\'t have any problems with this app. I have it on the galaxy s2 & my asus epad transformer prime, never crashes.  The tests are great and current def recommend
reviews.author: Ken White

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works great on galaxy S3. I like the database update so its always up... does not update the database automatically. but overall is great app well worth the money
reviews.author: Marcos Silva

reviews.title: Freezes and crashes
reviews.comment: Every time I try to open it, it freezes and crashes. An app that cost 40 dollars should not have this problem. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: These are no kidding \"actual FAA questions\".  Passed my exam today with an 83% first time.  Thanks Dauntless!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Yes, it\'s based on the question pool, but it has a detailed explanation for the reasons behind each answer, complete with lots of charts and diagrams.  You can also select which category of questions you want to work on, which is a great help when some are easier for you than others.  If you\'re a sim flyer, with no interest im going beyond that, this may not be a great learning tool, but if you\'re seriously working on getting your US pilot certificate, you want this app.
reviews.author: Tom N

reviews.title: Bullshit app
reviews.comment: Figured it would be more than just questions. Want refund!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worth the money. Best out there.  The fact that it updates to most recent questions makes it better than the others.
reviews.author: A Google User
